column1: NOTE: This requires 19GB of memory. Start this program with: java -Xms19G -jar weather-to-live.jar
This is WorldClim version 2.1 climate data for 1970-2000. This version was released in January 2020.
dataSetName:  The name to show in the GUI. Can use basic HTML.
absoluteZero: Whether the values start at 0 or can go negative (should find minimum)
